Title: An awaitable Blazor Modal Dialog
Description: I already showcased a simple modal dialog in a previous post. However, the dialog was not awaitable. In this post, I'll show you how to create an awaitable modal dialog.

Title: Create great MIDI 2.0 apps using Windows MIDI Services and C# | .NET Conf 2024
Description:
The open source Windows MIDI Services project (https://aka.ms/midi) is nearing its first consumer release, and is getting ready to be in-boxed in Windows. In this session, learn about what the new MIDI stack brings, and then learn how to use the developer preview bits available today to create MIDI 2.0 and MIDI 1.0 apps for Windows, including virtual devices, USB, and more, all using C#.

Title: Introduction to Event-Driven Architecture (EventHighway)
Description:
In this session, I'm going to walk you through event-driven architecture as a pattern - we will explore existing implementations and available offerings in that space and then lastly I'm going to introduce you to an open-source standard-compliant .NET library that can help you implement event-driven systems especially at large scale/enterprise-level in less than 10 mins.

Here's some useful links:
EventHighway Nuget Package:
https://www.nuget.org/packages/EventHighway

EventHighway Source Code:
https://github.com/hassanhabib/EventHighway

The Standard:
https://github.com/hassanhabib/The-Standard

Description: Hello, I am Swapnil. I'm a Software Engineer based in London.
